items.title: Danish PM tells Trump to stop 'threats' against Greenland
items.description: Mette Frederiksen said the "US has no right to annex any of the three nations in the Danish kingdom".

items.title: Police identify all 40 victims of Swiss bar fire
items.description: Among those killed by the blaze at Le Constellation is 16-year-old Swiss national Arthur Brodard, his mother confirms.

items.title: At least 30 killed in attack on Nigeria village
items.description: It is the latest in a spate of violent attacks in Niger state, and comes a day after officials said schools could reopen following a mass abduction la...

items.title: Can Maduro's trusted lieutenant now work for Trump?
items.description: Delcy Rodríguez, a close ally of captured Venezuelan leader Nicolás Maduro, has been named interim president.

items.title: Who is Cilia Flores, Venezuela's once-powerful first lady?
items.description: Long seen as a powerful figure, Flores has also faced allegations of corruption and nepotism.
